section.10: The Book of Leading the Prayer (Al-Imamah)

hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Uthman bin 'Affan said:"I heard the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) say: 'Whoever does wudu' properly, then walks to (attend) the prescribed prayer, and prays with the people or with the congregation or in the Masjid, Allah will forgive him his sins
